title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ENTER INTO AGREEMENT AND/OR CONTRACTS WITH SERVICE PROVIDERS FOR THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE ACTIVITIES/OR FESTIVITIES HEREUNDER LISTED WITH CORRESPONDING DETAILS TO BE CONDUCTED FOR THE ENTIRE DURATION OF THE 24TH BANAMOS FESTIVAL IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TOWN'S 410TH FOUNDATION ANNIVERSARY THIS COMING SEPTEMBER 16 TO 20, 2025 AND RATIFYING THE SAME THEREAFTER. -
